alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 01 at 3:17PM HST until January 03 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM HST TUESDAY... .An incoming northwest swell (310-320 degree) is expected to rapidly build through the night and peak on Monday at warning levels. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Surf rapidly building to 20 to 30 feet along north- facing shores and 15 to 20 feet along west-facing shores.. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
